baseRuleHeader.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 25

baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，多畜好色器者，尼薩耆波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 25

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼藏積器。物尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 29
